---
category: news
title: "Amazon Develops 'Lifestyle Imagery' AI for Lazy Advertisers"
excerpt: "The Amazon Ads team is launching a new image generation service in beta, which takes advantage of generative AI to place products in realistic, but completely fake settings with a short description and the push of a button. If it proves popular, we should hopefully never see a photo of a toaster or an air fryer on a white background again."
